devdoc.details: A contract for deploying and configuring the full Router contract.

constructor.details: Instantiate this contract and set the allowed caller of `initializeRouter()`      to `initializeCaller`.

die(address).details: Destroy this contract. Only callable from ourselves (from `initializeRouter()`).

params.ethRecipient: Receiver of any ETH in this contract.

getBootstrapper().details: Retrieve the bootstrapper address to use when constructing `Router`.

migrateRouter(address,address,(address,a.details: Initialize the `Router` contract with the full feature set,      transfer ownership to `owner`, then self-destruct.

params.features: Features to add to the proxy.
params.router: The instance of the Router contract. Router should        been constructed with this contract as the bootstrapper.

returns._router: The configured Router contract. Same as the `router` parameter.
